sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_J401M ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , ACC_NO , SIZ_AMT_MN , SIZ_MM_AMT , FIX_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #accNo# , #sizAmtMn# , #sizMmAmt# , #fixCd# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_J401M SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , ACC_NO=#accNo# , SIZ_AMT_MN=#sizAmtMn# , SIZ_MM_AMT=#sizMmAmt# , FIX_CD=#fixCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND ACC_NO=#accNo# AND SIZ_AMT_MN=#sizAmtMn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_J401M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND ACC_NO=#accNo# AND SIZ_AMT_MN=#sizAmtMn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , ACC_NO , SIZ_AMT_MN , SIZ_MM_AMT , FIX_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_J401M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND ACC_NO=#accNo# AND SIZ_AMT_MN=#sizAmtMn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , ACC_NO , SIZ_AMT_MN , SIZ_MM_AMT , FIX_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_J401M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , ACC_NO DESC , SIZ_AMT_MN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_J401M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
